name: chaotic-io
description: The `io.thechaoticweb.tk` service has an API that you can use, taking advantage of the `socket.io` library. ```javascript var socket = io.connect('io.thechaoticweb.tk'); socket.on('connection', function() {   socket.emit('namespace:function', parameters); // Replace `namespace:function` with the function you want to execute and `parameters` with the parameters to pass to the function.   socket.on('namespace:function', function(returnValue) {     // React to the response to the response of `namespace:function` here.   }); }); ``` Function names are stated in the subheadings below.
